text: Adi Andojo Soetjipto (11 April 1932 â€“ 12 January 2022) was an Indonesian politician, lawyer and educator. He was an associate justice of the Supreme Court of Indonesia from 1981 until his retirement in 1997. Soetjipto was nominated twice for the position by the People's Representative Council in 1979 and 1980. Soetjipto died in Jakarta, Indonesia on 12 January 2022, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Indonesian academics Category:Indonesian judges Category:Asian lawyers
title: Adi Andojo Soetjipto
